text: The A12 is a short autoroute (motorway) in France. It used to be called the Autoroute de Bretagne (Autoroute of Brittany) in French. It is to the west of Paris. It goes between the A13 and the N10. The autoroute is about long. ==Exits and junctions== Junction number & name Northbound exits Southbound exits 1 A13 A13 D134, Saint-Cyr-l'Ã‰cole 3 N12 N12 A12B (entrance only) N10, Montigny-le-Bretonneux (Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines) N10, Montigny-le-Bretonneux (Saint-Quentin-en-Yvelines) ==References== Category:Autoroutes in France
